login-username.text: Choose a unique username that you'll remember. This will be your identity in the Griffin's Rise community.

login-password.text: Use a strong password with at least 8 characters, including numbers and symbols.

register-confirm.text: Re-enter your password to make sure it matches exactly.

journal-date.text: Enter the date when you opened this position. Use YYYY-MM-DD format for consistency.

journal-asset.text: The trading pair or asset symbol (e.g., BTC/USD, ETH/USDT, AAPL).

journal-direction.text: Select 'Long' if you're betting the price will go up, 'Short' if you're betting it will go down.

journal-thesis.text: Write your reasoning for this trade. What analysis led you to this decision? This is crucial for learning.

journal-entry.text: The price at which you entered the position. Be precise for accurate P&L calculations.

journal-exit.text: The price at which you closed the position. Leave blank for open positions.

journal-sl.text: Stop Loss: The price at which you'll cut your losses if the trade goes against you.

journal-tp.text: Take Profit: The price at which you plan to close the position for a profit.

journal-size.text: Position size in dollars or percentage of portfolio. This affects your risk management.

journal-emotion.text: How did you feel during this trade? Tracking emotions helps identify psychological patterns.

journal-mistakes.text: What could you have done better? Honest self-reflection is key to improvement.

dashboardTab.text: View your trading statistics, performance charts, and analytics here.

educationTab.text: Access comprehensive trading education, guides, and video tutorials.

syllabusTab.text: Follow the structured learning path from beginner to advanced trading mastery.

journalTab.text: Log your trades, track performance, and analyze your trading patterns.

2fa-setup.text: Two-Factor Authentication adds extra security to your account. We recommend using Google Authenticator or Authy.

recovery-key.text: Store this recovery key safely offline. You'll need it to recover your account if you lose access.
